item.title: Twitchは1年間テストした後、クリップやライブストリームをスクロールできるTikTokスタイルのディスカバリーフィードを4月後半に展開する予定だ（Emma Roth/The Verge）
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
Twitch plans to roll out its TikTok-style discovery feed later in April, letting users scroll clips and livestreams, after testing the feature for a year  —  After nearly a year of testing, Twitch's new TikTok-style discovery feed will finally roll out to all users later this month.

item.title: 音楽著作権投資家コンコード、ヒプグノシス・ソングス・ファンド買収で合意 曲カタログ会社の評価額は約14億ドル、ヒプグノシスの混乱期に終止符（Amy Thomson/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Amy Thomson / Bloomberg:
Music rights investor Concord agrees to buy Hipgnosis Songs Fund in a deal valuing the song catalog company at ~$1.4B, capping a period of turmoil for Hipgnosis  —  - Concord's long term backer Apollo will provide financing  — Hipgnosis struggled to recoup its investment on music rights

item.title: 英国メディアの男女賃金格差の分析：最大手メディア組織の76％が、2022年から2023年にかけて上位給与層に占める女性の割合を増加させた（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
An analysis of the gender pay gap in UK media: 76% of the biggest media organizations increased the proportion of women in their top pay tier from 2022 to 2023  —  Average gender pay gap across major UK media organisations now stands at 11%.  —  Three-quarters of the UK's biggest media …

item.title: インドのニュースアグリゲーターDailyhuntの親会社であるVerSe Innovationが、ニューヨークを拠点とするデジタル雑誌ストアMagzterを非公開の現金・株式取引で買収（The Economic Times紙）
item.description:
The Economic Times:
VerSe Innovation, the parent of Indian news aggregator Dailyhunt, acquires New York-based digital magazine store Magzter in an undisclosed cash and stock deal  —  Homegrown digital newsstand Magzter, founded in 2011 and offering a cross-platform, self-service experience, has been acquired by Dailyhunt.

item.title: オスカー受賞者RRRの成功は、Netflixの米国カタログにテルグ語映画の波をもたらした。
item.description:
Russell Brandom / Rest of World:
How Oscar winner RRR's success brought a wave of Telugu-language movies to Netflix's US catalog, about 50% of which is now made up of non-English content  —  Netflix's U.S. catalog has more content in Telugu than in German, Russian, or any dialect of Chinese.

Gene Maddaus / Variety:
A Los Angeles ethics agency fines former CBS CEO Les Moonves $15K for misconduct in obtaining confidential police info about a sexual assault claim against him  —  Leslie Moonves, the former CEO of CBS, was fined $15,000 on Wednesday by the L.A. item.title: TikTok、写真とテキストコンテンツを共有するInstagramのライバル「TikTok Notes」をオーストラリアとカナダでAndroidとiOSで限定テスト展開開始（Sheena Vasani/The Verge）
item.description:
Sheena Vasani / The Verge:
TikTok starts rolling out TikTok Notes, its Instagram rival for sharing photo and text content, for limited testing in Australia and Canada on Android and iOS  —  TikTok has started rolling out its Instagram rival, TikTok Notes, to select Android and iOS users “for download and limited testing in Australia and Canada.”

item.title: 米著作権局がAI法と格闘するなか、ある作家がAIから「テキストの選択、調整、配置」の限定的著作権を獲得した方法（Kate Knibbs/Wired）
item.description:
Kate Knibbs / Wired:
How one author gained a limited copyright for the “selection, coordination, and arrangement of text” from AI, as the US Copyright Office wrestles with AI law  —  Elisa Shupe was initially rebuffed when she tried to copyright a book she wrote with help from ChatGPT.

item.title: ニューズウィーク誌のAI活用を紹介。映像制作、AIに特化したライブニュースデスクによる速報、技術者による初稿執筆など（Andrew Deck/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Andrew Deck / Nieman Lab:
A look at Newsweek's use of AI, including in video production, an AI-focused Live News desk for breaking stories, and letting the tech write some first drafts  —  The legacy publication is leaning on AI for video production, a new breaking news team, and first drafts of some stories.

item.title: Parks Associates：米国でインターネットを利用している世帯は、すべての視聴デバイスで週に平均43.5時間ビデオを視聴しており、2020年の37.2時間から増加している。
item.description:
James Careless / TV Tech:
Parks Associates: US households with internet now consume an average 43.5 hours of video per week across all viewing devices, up from 37.2 hours in 2020  —  Those homes are now watching six more hours of video per week than they were in 2020  —  U.S. Internet households now consume …

item.title: フォーブスがAIディープフェイクポルノツールと「ヌーディファイア」テレグラムボットを宣伝する120以上のYouTube動画と27のGoogle広告を発見した後、Googleはそれらを削除した（Thomas Brewster/Forbes）
item.description:
Thomas Brewster / Forbes:
After Forbes found 120+ YouTube videos and 27 Google ads promoting AI deepfake porn tools and “nudifier” Telegram bots, Google took them down  —  The company removed more than 100 YouTube videos after Forbes found the platform was promoting AI nudifiers used by school bullies and a convicted pedophile.

item.title: 約50人のNPRスタッフが、ウリ・ベルリナー氏のエッセイの「事実誤認と誤謬」を公に非難するよう求めるNPR首脳部への書簡に署名（Ben Mullin/@benmullin）
item.description:
Ben Mullin / @benmullin:
About 50 NPR staffers sign a letter to NPR leadership calling for a public rebuke of the “factual inaccuracies and elisions” in Uri Berliner's essay  —  new: About 50 NPR employees sign a letter to CEO Katherine Maher and top editor Edith Chapin calling for, among other things, a public rebuke of the “factual inaccuracies and elisions” in Uri Berliner's Free Press essay. [image]

item.title: ウリ・ベルリナーは、NPRの問題を「分裂的な見解を持つ新CEOに中傷されるようなニュースルームでは働けない」として、NPRを辞職すると語った（Oliver Darcy/CNN）
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
Uri Berliner says he is resigning from NPR as he “cannot work in a newsroom where I am disparaged by a new CEO whose divisive views confirm” NPR's problems  —  Uri Berliner, a National Public Radio senior editor who wrote a scathing online essay accusing the public radio network …

item.title: 欧州データ保護委員会は、メタのような大規模なオンライン・プラットフォームは、ユーザーに行動ターゲティング広告なしでサービスを無料で利用するオプションを与えるべきだと述べている（Foo Yun Chee/ロイター）。
item.description:
Foo Yun Chee / Reuters:
The European Data Protection Board says large online platforms like Meta should give users an option to use their services for free without behavioral ads  —  Meta Platforms (META.O) and other large online platforms should give users an option to use their services for free without targeted advertising …
